titles.title: 586 I Do Not Ask O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I do not ask
O Lord that life may be
A pleasant road
I do not ask
That thou wouldst take from me
Aught of its load

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I do not ask
That flowers should always spring
Beneath my feet
I know too well
The poison and the sting
Of things too sweet

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For one thing only
Lord dear Lord I plead
Lead me aright
Though strength should falter
And though heart should bleed
Through peace to light

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I do not ask O Lord
That Thou shouldst shed
Full radiance here
Give but a ray of peace
That I may tread
Without a fear

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I do not ask my
Cross to understand
My way to see
Better in darkness
Just to feel Thy hand
And follow Thee

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Joy is like restless day
But peace divine
Like quiet night
Lead me O Lord
Till perfect day shall shine
Through peace to light
